records.location_details: Operational area, near BCU FERES, in a trench alongside a rutty road.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within operational area is redacted.
records.context_note: A Frontex team member broke his hand after losing balance and falling into a trench during a night patrol in the operational area near BCU FERES. He was hospitalized and later left upon request.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Justification 4 broke his hand during his night shift

records.location_details: Parking area of a hotel near BCU Text Removed - Justification 3, in the framework of JO FOA Land.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific hotel and BCU location are redacted.
records.context_note: A Frontex team member (Text Removed - Justification 4) was identified as the person who pointed a gun at three Greek citizens in a hotel parking area in Alexandroupolis. The team member was suspended from all Frontex operational activities pending investigation.
records.evidence_quote: unknown person... pointed a gun (pistol) against them... identified as one Text Removed - Justification 4

records.location_details: On the bank of Evros River, in the operational area of BCU Text Removed - Justification 3 Police Station.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location on Evros River bank is redacted.
records.context_note: A dead body of a male (30-40 years old) was found on the bank of the Evros River by Hellenic Police officers during a patrol. No travel documents were found. The body was transferred to Alexandroupolis Hospital for autopsy.
records.evidence_quote: detected a dead body (male - age between 30 and 40 years old) on the bank of Evros River.

records.location_details: Rural road close to Text Removed - Justification 3 village.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific village and road are redacted.
records.context_note: A vehicle carrying 13 Afghan migrants overturned on a rural road near a village, due to high speed. All 13 migrants were injured and transported to Didymoteicho Hospital. The driver-facilitator escaped. Investigation for the accident and human smuggling is ongoing.
records.evidence_quote: detected one vehicle that had overturned, due to high speed, in the rural road close to Text Removed - Justification 3 village. At that time thirteen (13) persons (13 AFG) on board have been reported by HPOs on spot

records.location_details: Crossroad close to the village Sohos, 5 km from a police checkpoint, where a car crashed into another GRC car.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific crossroad and crash location are not exact.
records.context_note: A Mercedes car carrying 11 migrants fled a police checkpoint near Sohos village, crashed into another car, resulting in 3 deaths and 12 injuries (11 migrants, 1 GRC driver). All injured were hospitalized in Thessaloniki.
records.evidence_quote: The police noticed on the spot in the Mercedes eleven (11) persons (migrants) slightly injured as well as the driver of the other GRC car was slightly injured. All 12 persons were brought to the hospital by the ambulance. ... Three (3) bodies brought to Thessaloniki hospital for the autopsy.

records.location_details: Toll gate before BCP Text Removed - Justification 3, on the way towards N. Macedonia, in the operational area of Text Removed - Justification 3/Greece.
records.where_clear: Toll gate near the border with North Macedonia, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific BCP and location are redacted.
records.context_note: A car with a facilitator and 12 migrants, escaping Greek police towards North Macedonia, crashed through a toll gate. No one was injured. The facilitator was arrested, and migrants were taken to a police station.
records.evidence_quote: Twelve (12) migrants were found on the board of the car no one was seriously injured.

records.location_details: National road close to Text Removed - Justification 3 village, 3 KM from the point of arrest.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific village and road are redacted.
records.context_note: A vehicle with Bulgarian plates, carrying 16 male persons, fled a border check on a national road near a village. It crashed, resulting in 6 instant deaths and 10 injuries. The two facilitators (Text Removed - Justification 5 nationals) were arrested and hospitalized. Injured migrants (9 EGY, 1 PAK) were hospitalized in Alexandroupolis. Autopsy requested for the deceased.
records.evidence_quote: Sixteen male persons on board have been reported by HP on the spot. Six of them were instantly killed. The remaining ten persons have been transported in the hospital in order to receive proper medical treatments as they were injured and hospitalized.

records.location_details: Street between Text Removed - Justification 3, near village Text Removed - Justification 3.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific locations and BCU are heavily redacted.
records.context_note: A car with a SYR facilitator and 8 EGY migrants, fleeing Greek police, crashed. The SYR driver died. One EGY migrant was injured and hospitalized, while 7 others were apprehended. The deceased driver was facilitating illegal exit.
records.evidence_quote: Ambulance arriving at the scene of the accident established the death of the SYR national driving the car. ... one (1) person injured by a car accident, seven (7) persons apprehended

records.location_details: Provincial Road close to the south entrance of Text Removed - Justification 3.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location and BCU are redacted.
records.context_note: A vehicle carrying 15 irregular migrants (3 IRQ, 1 PSE, 4 SYR, 5 AFG, 2 EGY) and a BGR facilitator overturned on a provincial road due to high speed. 3 migrants were slightly injured and hospitalized, then released. All persons were arrested.
records.evidence_quote: detected one vehicle that had overturned, due to its high speed... Three (03) of the irregular migrants were transported to Didymoteicho Hospital

records.location_details: Bridge under construction, where a migrant fell into a gap.
records.context_note: A Pakistani migrant accidentally fell several meters down a gap in a bridge under construction, sustaining injuries requiring hand surgery. He was hospitalized in Thessaloniki, then Kilkis, and is expected to be released soon.
records.evidence_quote: a migrant accidentally fell several metres down a gap in a bridge under construction.

records.location_details: Rural area of Text Removed - Justification 3 village.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific village and rural area are redacted.
records.context_note: A truck carrying 11 irregular migrants (10 Iraqis, 1 Egyptian) and a Bulgarian facilitator crashed due to high speed in a rural area near a village. All 11 migrants were apprehended and transferred to Didymoteicho hospital for precautionary medical treatment, none seriously injured.
records.evidence_quote: a truck Text Removed - Justification 5) had accident due to high speed in Text Removed - Justification 3 village rural area... eleven (11) irregular migrants... All migrants were transferred to Didimoticho hospital for precautionary reasons

records.location_details: Evros Area, detected by Hellenic Police Officers patrolling the operational area of Text Removed - Justification 3.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros Area is redacted.
records.context_note: Hellenic Police officers found a dead body of a male (20-25 years old) in the Evros Area during a patrol. No travel documents were found. The body was transferred to Alexandroupolis Hospital for autopsy.
records.evidence_quote: detected a dead body (male), age betwen 20-25 years old in Evros Area.

records.location_details: Text Removed - Justification 3 (for latitude/longitude, but it's a redaction). The incident is about a person testing positive for COVID-19. The person is hospitalized in Alexandroupolis.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location of infection or initial reporting is redacted. Hospitalization location is Alexandroupolis.
records.context_note: A Frontex team member (Text Removed - Justification 4) tested positive for COVID-19 after feeling unwell and being monitored in quarantine. The individual is currently hospitalized in Alexandroupolis.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Justification 4 reported about a new confirmed case of Covid-19

records.location_details: Text Removed - Justification 3 highway, close to Text Removed - Justification 3, Evros, Greece.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific highway and locations are redacted.
records.context_note: A vehicle carrying 7 irregular migrants and a facilitator crashed due to high speed on a highway in Evros, Greece. All 7 migrants were injured (5 slightly, 2 critically) and transferred to Alexandroupolis hospital. Investigation is pending.
records.evidence_quote: a Text Removed - Justification 5 vehicle with seven (07) irregular migrants... crashed due to high speed... five (05) of them are slightly injured, two (02 male) of them are in critical condition.

records.location_details: Text Removed - Justification 3 highway, Evros, Greece.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific highway and locations are redacted.
records.context_note: A car carrying 12 people (including driver) crashed on a highway in Evros, Greece. Initially, 7 were killed and 5 injured (2 critically). Later, one critically injured migrant and the critically injured driver died, bringing the total dead to 9. Three survivors were discharged and moved to BCU Feres.
records.evidence_quote: At the time of incident there were twelve (12) people on board... seven (07) people including the driver were killed... Now the total migrants died in the accident is 9.

records.location_details: River Evros, close to the Greek bank, in the area of Text removed - Justification 3, Evros, Greece.
records.where_clear: Evros River, Greek bank, Evros, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location on Evros River bank is redacted.
records.context_note: A dead body of a male (25-35 years old) was found in the Evros River, close to the Greek bank. Autopsy estimated he drowned 3 months prior. A Moroccan credit card with an Arabic name was found on him.
records.evidence_quote: one (1) male dead body has been found in river Evros, close to the Greek bank

records.location_details: Area around Text removed - justification 3, Evros, Greece.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location is redacted. Gunshots heard from an area.
records.context_note: Frontex and Hellenic Police officers reported hearing gunshots from an area in Evros, Greece. The shots were far away, no visual contact with shooters, and no injuries were reported. Hellenic Police and military are monitoring the area.
records.evidence_quote: informed about hearable gunshots from the area around Text removed - justification 3. ... Nobody was injured

records.location_details: Railway line running from Alexandroupolis to Ormenio, Evros, Greece.
records.where_clear: Railway line between Alexandroupolis and Ormenio, Evros, Greece
records.geocodable_query: Railway line Alexandroupolis to Ormenio, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific point on the railway line is not given.
records.context_note: A male migrant was hit and killed by a train on the railway line between Alexandroupolis and Ormenio. Investigation suggests he was likely sleeping on the tracks. An Afghan ID card was found on him.
records.evidence_quote: one (01) migrant (male) was hit and killed by train running from Alexandroupolis to Ormenio.

records.location_details: Vicinity of BCP Text removed - justification 3, near the river, Evros, Greece. Shots reported coming from a TUR patrol in the area.
records.where_clear: Evros region, near the Greek-Turkish border, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location and BCP are redacted. Origin of shots is attributed to a TUR patrol.
records.context_note: Frontex and Hellenic Police patrols in the Evros region, near the Greek-Turkish border, reported hearing multiple gunshots over several hours. Some shots were reported to come from a Turkish patrol. No injuries were reported. Frontex personnel were instructed to maintain safety measures.
records.evidence_quote: reported that they heard a few possible gunfire shots, coming from Text removed - justification 3. ... Nobody was injured
